description.name: Unofficial update site for the GTED Eclipse plugin

site.description: The GTED Eclipse plugin is an editor for GNU gettext internalization files. This update site is provided as a hopefully temporary substitute for the official www.gted.org site, which has been unavailable for quite some time.

category-def.name: gted
category-def.label: GTED GNU gettext editor plugin
category-def.description: The GTED Eclipse plugin is an editor for GNU gettext internalization files.
